name: Root (itch) (IdealismFive)
description:
Hello, welcome to the operating system, you have been granted super administrator privileges. From now on, you are called "Root" and your task is to remove viruses and bugs from your computer and bring it back to health. (Hint: If you fail, you will be shut down with this computer.)

Your goal is to find the super virus (boss) that will crash the system and destroy the boss. You can acquire skills and batteries (hit points) by exploring the different folders (rooms) in the system. Please note that skills are not necessary to destroy the bosses, but collecting all the skills will allow you to get through quickly. Also, during your exploration you will encounter difficulties such as small bugs or viruses. Lastly, enjoy your working day!

Key tips: Use "W, S, A, D" or the keyboard "up, down, left, right" to control the character movement; use the mouse to turn the perspective; press the "F" key to trigger a normal attack, press "J" key to trigger shield, and press "Z, X, C, V, B" keys to call the corresponding skill.

Skills: 

1. Battery: Press "B" to use it. It can increase HP by one block.

2. JavaScript: Press "Z" to use it. Use it on a monster can kill it directly; use it on a boss can decrease the boss's orange HP by 25%.

3. Java: Press "X" to use it. Use it on a monster can kill it directly; use it on a boss can decrease the boss's blue HP by 25%. When the blue HP turns to zero, the boss's shield will be destroyed.

4. C#: Press "C" to use it. Use it on a monster can kill it directly; use it on a boss can decrease the boss's purple HP by 25%..

5. Python: Press "V" to use it. Use it on a monster can kill it directly; use it on a boss can decrease the boss's yellow HP by 25%.
